title: Brilliant Pain
description: I grabbed Troy's hand as the captain's calm voice recited something about a sudden storm and the flight attendants flew freely around the cabin.Troy squeezed my hand. "We won't die.""How do you know?" I snapped."Donâ€™t worry, Ruby. We won't die, and if we do, I'll find you. Earlier than in this life."
author: Edita Birschbach
